amendment.description: Amendment includes a Sense of Congress stating that agriculture operations, farms, and rural communities should receive equal consideration through lending activities for small businesses, particularly small and mid-size farms and agriculture operations, and further states that attention should be given to ensuring there is adequate small business credit and financing availability in the agriculture and farming sectors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to include a Sense of Congress stating that agriculture operations, farms, and rural communities should receive equal consideration through lending activities for small businesses, particularly small and mid-size farms and agriculture operations; and attention should be given to ensuring there is adequate small business credit and financing availability in the agriculture and farming sectors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loebsack amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
